title: Sleepwalk Society
description: Violet and her best friends Terran and Joey have just finished their first year of college. Violet is ready to go back home for a care free summer with her friends. Things become complicated when Joey and Terran begin a roller coaster romance that threatens the close friendship they have known for years. Things are different and Violet knows this will be the most important summer of her life.
author: Kendare Blake
